title: Which BSc course is easiest? - Quora

response.answer_text: No subject course is easy until you love to read the subjects for example I love to read physics and found it easy but many other person will not find it as easy as I have. So I suggest you to opt for a combination of subject in BSc which you like most to read or you have knowledge about the subject. Don't with anyone's advice. Regards.

All bsc course isn't easy but you like to subject although it's very easy .incase do you not subject it's very hard .so you can choose in Ur career field and do you have interest to all subjects and do you have studies .this is very easy for all students . firstly relaxing in Ur mindset after you can started is studying it's very easier then get better knowledge .best of luck
